name: Scroll (salvacam)
description:
ASCII BASIC GAME 10Liner contest entry

Game for Sinclair ZX81

With the keys O and P you move the asterisk to the left and right, you have to prevent it from going out of the way that is represented with the black spaces, if you are in a blank space, the game ends, showing the score and exits the execution to play again, put Run again and press enter.
